## AozoraBunkoSnapshot

```{r}
data("AozoraBunkoSnapshot")
snapshot <- dplyr::sample_n(AozoraBunkoSnapshot, 20) # Because it is too large to show whole entries, sampling 20 rows.
datatable(snapshot)
```
